channel.title: Anime & Manga on Geekosaur
channel.description: Recent content in Anime & Manga on Geekosaur

item.title: Fall 2020 Anime - What I'm Watching
item.description:
A bit (spoilers) THIS IS A SPOILER late to the party, but let’s talk seasonal anime. This is going to be a slow season for me, as I both behind in some titles, and reading/watching other non-anime stuff (and playing Animal Crossing).

I guess I can start with the things I’m behind, which is mainly 2: Re:Zero and Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?. For obvious reasons, I can’t start Danmachi’s 3rd season, even though I’m not sure I’m in the mood for it right now, and Re:Zero is something that interests me more/has a higher priority than most seasonal anime for fall 2020. I should also add that I have all Sound! Euphonium movies in my backlog. whew

item.title: Anime I'm Watching This Season
item.description: We are a few weeks into summer 2020 season, and it’s time to talk about which anime I’m watching this time. Let’s see!

item.title: Black Clover [Friday Reads: May 29, 2020]
item.description: As I mentioned in another post, two weeks ago I started reading Blck Clover, after catching up with Fire Force. I was curious as many people on my Twitter feed are pasionate about it. And they were not wrong!

item.title: Spy x Family - Reading Now
item.description: Yesterday, I’ve decided to start reading Spy x Family, a comedy manga about a spy, a hit-woman, and a telepath kid.
